QuestData.Title: Words of Warning
QuestData.Description: Thanks for helping me, $n. My name's Sasha. Listen, I have to get the hell out of here.$B$BThe people that sent you here... my people... they've changed. They're not good people anymore... and they want to turn you into one of... one of them.$B$BThis... 'test' they sent you on is just the beginning.$B$BHead to the northwestern end of Silverbrook. You'll find something of interest to you.$B$BGood luck... and trust no one.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the northwestern end of Silverbrook.
QuestData.RewardText: Who's there? Are you here to kill me?$B$BPlease! You don't have to do this!
